She leads the SECUSO research group. From August 2016 until March 2018 she was a Professor (Kooperationsprofessur) at the Department of Computer Science of Technische Universität Darmstadt (Germany). From December 2015 until December 2018, she has been appointed Full Professor for Usable Privacy and Security at Karlstad University (Sweden). Before she was an Assistant Professor at TU Darmstadt. Prof. Volkamer has been heading the research group "SECUSO - Security, Usability and Society" since 2011. From May 1st to August 31st 2011, she worked as a visiting researcher at CMU/CUPS.
